page.title: 08A childs Day
page.content: My name is Lucy Delve I am 10 years old.At 8.00am I get up,wash and go downstairs for breakfast which is cereals.Then I brush my teeth and walk to school.School starts at 9.00am and first we have Assembly followed by Mathematics.After playtime we do English and at midday we have dinner and I bring my own packed lunch.In the afternoon we do Environmentd Studies,Topic Work and Sciece and at 3.00pm we go home.When I get home I have something to eat and drink and then I go and play with my friend Anna,or help with the goats and chickens.At 5.00pm I have tea and get changed to go dancing at Hope Farm Community Centre.After dancing I have a bath and watch televsion before going to bed.
